entry.title: Introducing Play! 2
entry.summary: Play! 2 is a Java/Scala framework based on a lightweight, stateless, web-friendly architecture for highly-scalable applications. This screencast will act as a primer for getting up and running with Play! 2.
entry.content: Play! 2 is a Java/Scala framework based on a lightweight, stateless, web-friendly architecture for highly-scalable applications. This screencast will act as a primer for getting up and running with Play! 2.
